choiceresponse.p: What benefits do stream pipelines provide to distributed systems? (select all that apply):
choiceresponse.label: Pick one or more answers

div.p: The use of streams helps to enable parallel processing for greater throughput, allows components to process data at different speeds from each other and provides a way for disparate system components to communicate with each other using standard messages.
The use of stream pipelines is unrelated to the expected number of component failures.
